Instruction: Chop bell pepper, garlic cloves, and green onions.'
In a large skillet or wok, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat.'
Add minced ginger and garlic cloves to the skillet and saute for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.'
Add chopped bell pepper and onion to the skillet and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, until vegetables are tender-crisp.'
'Drizzle soy sauce over the mixture and sprinkle with red pepper flakes.'
Stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes, until everything is heated through and well combined.'
